name: 50A
tag_list: e-reputation, digital, communication, agency, seo, social-media, community-management, barcamp, coworking
overview:
Since 2005, 50A helps business defining, setting new process and best practices in their communication strategy. Relaying on co-working, 50A teams gathers a wide range of experts toward a unique purpose. A dozen of collaborators achieve consulting, technical and creative projects as such as website design and development, strategical roadmap planning, community management system, facebook apps, mobile and tablet apps.

Beside, 50A event department creates co-working happenings like “Barcamp”. At the center of galactic 50A’s strategy, the “Coworking Lab”, a R&D program, lets the agency share its office with start-ups or innovativ service business.

This approach gives to 50A and its clients (Dom Perignon, Total, Conseil Général du Var, Silic, Union des Maisons Francaises…) the benefits of experiencing, cultivating new skills and a wider network.
